QuestData.Title: Ride to Ironforge
QuestData.Description: For just a few coins, one of my gryphons will take you to Ironforge. From there, deliver Gremlock's list to Golnir Bouldertoe. You'll find him in the Deep Mountain Mining Guild. That's in the Great Forge District of Ironforge, which is right where my gryphon will drop you off!$B$BSpeak to me again when you're ready for the journey.
QuestData.LogDescription: Buy a gryphon to Ironforge from the gryphon master Brolan Galebeard, then bring Gremlock's List to Golnir Bouldertoe in Ironforge.
QuestData.CompletionText: What can I do for you, $gsir:my lady;?
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, the latest list of Gremlock's best pupils. I have a batch of honorary cleavers ready to go. I just need to engrave the names of the students...
